data.title: Arthritis Support, Resources, Research & Advocacy
data.meta_description: The Arthritis Foundation is the largest nonprofit organization dedicated to the prevention, control and cure of America's leading cause of disability.
data.text:
1 in 4 lives in pain.

Make a gift that goes 3X as far to conquer arthritis.

Match My Gift

July is JA Awareness Month

Kids get arthritis, too! Get the facts about this often invisible disease and how we’re making sure no child has to go it alone.

Get the Facts

Let’s Get Jingling in July!

Get in the festive spirit early and beat the heat! Now’s the time to register and get your fundraising going!

Start Fundraising Now

We Journey Together

Arthritis hits everyone differently, and you don’t have to go it alone. The Arthritis Foundation is here for you.

How We Help

Story of Yes

Tell Us Your Happy Place

Life on a ranch in New Mexico is just what Cohen needed to help him better manage the challenges of his SJIA.

See Cohen’s Ranch

Remembering Haydee Sedlmeier and her legacy

Despite her lifelong struggle with arthritis, Haydee was committed to helping and connecting people.

Dr. Julie Campbell, Pediatric Rheumatologist in Montana

Dr. Julie Campbell becomes the first pediatric rheumatologist in Montana in years.
